mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (sum(r.wincount) - sum(r.losecount)) DESC) ) AS idx, r.userId, sum(r.wincount) AS wincount, sum(r.losecount) AS losecount, u.username, u.badgeId FROM leagueRank r, user u WHERE r.userId = u.userId AND r.insertdate >= #{startDate} AND r.insertdate <= #{endDate} GROUP BY r.userId) t LIMIT #{start}, #{amount}
